javascript:(async()=>{/* ÂÖ•ÂäõÁî®„ÅÆ„Ç™„Éº„Éê„Éº„É¨„Ç§„Çí‰ΩúÊàê */ const div=document.createElement('div');div.style='position:fixed;top:10%;left:10%;width:80%;height:80%;z-index:1000000;background:white;padding:20px;border:2px solid #007aff;border-radius:12px;box-shadow:0 0 50px rgba(0,0,0,0.5);display:flex;flex-direction:column;gap:15px;font-family:sans-serif';div.innerHTML=`

JSON Stringifier(Comment & Multiline Support)

„Ç≥„Éº„Éâ„ÇíË≤º„Çä‰ªò„Åë„Å¶„ÄåÂ§âÊèõ„Äç„Éú„Çø„É≥„ÇíÊäº„Åó„Å¶„Åè„Å†„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇ// „Ç≥„É°„É≥„Éà„ÇÇÊîπË°å„Å®„Åó„Å¶‰øùÊåÅ„Åï„Çå„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

`;document.body.appendChild(div);const ta=document.getElementById('js-in');ta.focus();/* ÂÆüË°åÂá¶ÁêÜ */ document.getElementById('js-ok').onclick=async()=>{let code=ta.value;if(!code)return;try{if(code.includes('%'))code=decodeURIComponent(code)}catch(e){}/* JSON.stringify „ÅØÊîπË°å„Çí \\n „Å´Â§âÊèõ„Åó„Å¶„Åè„Çå„Çã„ÅÆ„Åß // „Ç≥„É°„É≥„Éà„ÇÇÂÆâÂÖ®„Å´„Å™„Çã */ const escaped=JSON.stringify(code);const result=escaped.slice(1,-1);/* ÂâçÂæå„ÅÆ " „ÇíÈô§Âéª */ await navigator.clipboard.writeText(result);div.remove();alert('„Ç≥„Éî„ÉºÂÆå‰∫ÜÔºÅ launcher.json „Å´Ë≤º„Çä‰ªò„Åë„Å¶„Åè„Å†„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇ');};document.getElementById('js-cancel').onclick=()=>div.remove();div.onkeydown=e=>{if(e.key==='Escape')div.remove()};})();void(0);

fi.code:
javascript:((o,p,u,i,v,e)=>{function imgLoad(){if(this.width){/* dataset.dim„Çí„Çª„ÉÉ„Éà */ this.par.nextSibling.dataset.dim=this.width + 'x' + this.height;}else{/* „ÇØ„É©„ÇπÂêç„Çí‰∏ÄËá¥„Åï„Åõ„Çã */ this.par.nextSibling.classList.add('error');}}if(window.itl_ujs)return itl_ujs.remove();/* ÁîªÂÉèURL„ÅÆÊäΩÂá∫ */ u=new Set();Array.from(document.all).forEach(e=>{if(e.tagName==='IMG' && e.src)u.add(e.src);const style=getComputedStyle(e);const props=['background-image','border-image-source','content','cursor','filter','list-style-image','mask-image','offset-path'];props.forEach(k=>{const match=style[k].match(/\burl\(['']?(.*?)['']?\)/);if(match)u.add(match[1]);});});/* Shadow DOM„ÅÆÊßãÁØâ */ p=document.createElement('DIV');p.id='itl_ujs';document.body.appendChild(p);o=p.attachShadow({mode:'open'});o.innerHTML=`
`;p=o.lastChild.lastChild;u.forEach(url=>{const a=document.createElement('A');a.href=url;a.target='_blank';a.rel='noopener noreferrer';a.innerHTML='
';const imgTag=a.firstChild;const infoDiv=a.lastChild;infoDiv.textContent=url.split('/').pop()|| url;const loader=new Image();loader.par=imgTag;loader.onload=imgLoad;loader.onerror=imgLoad;loader.src=url;imgTag.src=url;p.appendChild(a);});o.firstChild.nextSibling.onclick=function(ev){if(ev.target===this)document.getElementById('itl_ujs').remove();};})();void(0);
fi.name: fetch_images

fu.code: javascript:(function(){const DELAY=1000;const tripContainers=document.querySelectorAll('div[class*="_css-ggbmUT"]');console.log(`„Éà„É™„ÉÉ„Éó„Ç≥„É≥„ÉÜ„ÉäÊï∞: ${tripContainers.length}`);const trips=[];tripContainers.forEach(container=>{const tripId=container.getAttribute('href')?.match(/\/trips\/([a-f0-9-]+)/)?.[1];if(!tripId)return;const textDivs=[...container.querySelectorAll('div')].filter(div=>div.children.length===0&&div.textContent.trim());let destText='';let dateText='';let amountText='';let isCancelled=false;textDivs.forEach(div=>{const text=div.textContent.trim();const className=div.className;if(className.includes('_css-elQNxE')){destText=text;}else if(text.includes('Êúà')&&text.includes('Êó•')){dateText=text;}else if(/[$¬•Ôø•\\]|NT\$/.test(text)){amountText=text.split('‚Ä¢')[0].trim();if(text.includes('„Ç≠„É£„É≥„Çª„É´')){isCancelled=true;}}});trips.push({tripId,destText:destText||'unknown',dateText:dateText||'no-date',amountText:amountText||'no-amount',isCancelled});});console.log(`ÊäΩÂá∫‰ª∂Êï∞: ${trips.length}‰ª∂`);const validTrips=trips.filter(t=>!t.isCancelled);const cancelledCount=trips.length-validTrips.length;console.log(`ÊúâÂäπ: ${validTrips.length}‰ª∂„ÄÅ„Ç≠„É£„É≥„Çª„É´Ê∏à„ÅøÔºà„Çπ„Ç≠„ÉÉ„ÉóÔºâ: ${cancelledCount}‰ª∂`);if(validTrips.length===0){console.error('„ÉÄ„Ç¶„É≥„É≠„Éº„ÉâÂØæË±°„ÅåË¶ã„Å§„Åã„Çä„Åæ„Åõ„Çì„Åß„Åó„Åü');return;}(async()=>{for(let i=0;i<validTrips.length;i++){const{tripId,destText,dateText,amountText}=validTrips[i];const timestamp=Date.now();const pdfUrl=`https://riders.uber.com/trips/${tripId}/receipt?contentType=PDF&timestamp=${timestamp}`;const sanitize=(str)=>str.replace(/[\\/:*?"<>|]/g,'_').replace(/\s+/g,' ').trim();const filename=`${sanitize(dateText)}_${sanitize(amountText)}_${sanitize(destText)}.pdf`;console.log(`[${i+1}/${validTrips.length}] „ÉÄ„Ç¶„É≥„É≠„Éº„Éâ‰∏≠: ${filename}`);try{const response=await fetch(pdfUrl);if(!response.ok)throw new Error(`HTTP ${response.status}`);const blob=await response.blob();const url=URL.createObjectURL(blob);const a=document.createElement('a');a.href=url;a.download=filename;document.body.appendChild(a);a.click();document.body.removeChild(a);URL.revokeObjectURL(url);console.log(`‚úì ÂÆå‰∫Ü: ${filename}`);}catch(error){console.error(`‚úó „Ç®„É©„Éº: ${filename}`,error);}if(i<validTrips.length-1){await new Promise(resolve=>setTimeout(resolve,DELAY));}}console.log('ÂÖ®„Å¶ÂÆå‰∫Ü');})();})();
fu.name: fetch_uber_receipt

javascript:(function(d){function guid(){function s4(){return Math.floor((1 + Math.random())* 0x10000).toString(16).substring(1);}return s4()+ s4()+ '-' + s4()+ '-' + s4()+ '-' + s4()+ '-' + s4()+ s4()+ s4();}function getUrls(element){return element.innerHTML.match(/(?:(?:https?|ftp|file):\/\/|www\.|ftp\.)(?:\([-A-Z0-9+&@#\/%=~_|$?&!:,.]*\)|[-A-Z0-9+&@#\/%=~_|$?!:,.])*(?:\([-A-Z0-9+&@#\/%=~_|$?!:,.]*\)|[A-Z0-9+&@#\/%=~_|$])/igm).filter(function(url){return ~url.indexOf(".m3u8");});}var frames=document.getElementsByTagName("iframe");var urls=[];try{for(var i=0;i < frames.length;i++){var f=frames[i].contentDocument;getUrls(f.documentElement)}}catch(e){}var urls=urls.concat(getUrls(document.documentElement));var s=d.createElement('div');s.id="a" + guid();s.style='position: relative;top: 0;right: 0;z-index: 99999999;';s.innerHTML=urls.map(function(u){u=u.replace(/"/g,"");return '
' + u + '
';}).join('')+ '';d.body.insertBefore(s,d.body.firstChild);})(document);
mt.name: m3u8_extractor

ra.code: javascript:(()=>{var d=document.documentElement,b=document.body,es=b.querySelectorAll("*"),m=20;for(var i=0;i<es.length;++i){var e=es[i];var s=getComputedStyle(e);if(s.position!=='static'&&s.position!=='relative'){var r=e.getBoundingClientRect();if(r.x<=m&&r.y<=m&&r.right>=window.innerWidth - m&&r.bottom>=window.innerHeight - m){e.remove();}}}var s='\n/**/;position:static!important;overflow:auto!important;width:auto!important;height:auto!important;';d.setAttribute('style',(d.getAttribute('style')||'')+ s);b.setAttribute('style',(b.getAttribute('style')||'')+ s);})();void(0)

sd.code: javascript:(function(){switch(true){case window.location.href.includes("instagram.com"):location.assign(window.location.href.replace("instagram.com","imginn.com"));break;case window.location.href.includes("x.com"):location.assign(window.location.href.replace("x.com","xcancel.com"));break;default:window.alert("Are you sure this is Instagram or x.com?");}})();
